column5: I think the anhedonia, lack of motivation comes from withdrawal from nicotine, caffeine, thc and/or alcohol. I quit all four at once one time, and I couldn't get out of bed for six weeks except for work. I have started taking calcium supplements and drinking at least 1/2 a gallon of milk everyday bc calcium is what really drives our brains and other organ systems. I'm eating lots of jello too. It is made of gelatin which is mostly collagen which is required for remyelination of neurons. If I stay away from all drugs, including the supposed soft drugs, I feel much, much better.
